articles.description: Liverpool skipper Jordan Henderson has been offering a specific tactical quality that was previously offered by the injured Virgil van Dijk
articles.content:
The rumours attached to the absence of Jordan Henderson have proved to be true, with the midfielder officially confirmed by Liverpool to miss at least several weeks of action.

articles.author: David Maddock
articles.title: Liverpool ready to lose Alisson as club offers support after father's death - Mirror Online
articles.description: Liverpool goalkeeper Alisson's father tragically drowned aged 57 while swimming on his property in Brazil on Wednesday
articles.content:
Liverpool have asked that their goalkeeper Alisson is allowed privacy, as he grieves the shock death of his father.
